CHAT.comment: CARLSBAD TECHNOLOGY, INC., Petitioner v. HIF BIO, INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:20 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GLENN W. RHODES ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE S. ALLISON ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GLENN W. RHODES ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:17 p.m., the case in the above-entitle matter was submitted.)
